text: Qin Jiushao was a mathematician, meteorologist, inventor, politician, and writer from China. He was born in 1202 and died in 1261.Qin Jiushao == References == Category:1202 births Category:1261 deaths Category:Chinese mathematicians Category:Chinese astronomers Category:13th-century Chinese writers Category:People from Sichuan Category:13th-century Chinese scientists
title: Qin Jiushao
